item.title: [317]What's wrong with this code? I get 100 errors.. [317]
item.dc:creator: @Andy89898 Andy89898
item.description:
@Andy89898 wrote:

hey i put ur code in and some improvements i made first 2 errors then 1 then 3 now 19… But i had fixd the other lot and it led to these 19 so this is what it said in the command prompt of compile :

Compiling..... client.java:3060: cannot find sym symbol : method method68(int) location: class client method68(-670); ^ client.java:3251: cannot find sym symbol : method method68(int) location: class client method68(-670); ^ client.java:3724: illegal forward if(anInt1011 > 0) ^ client.java:3727: return outside return; ^ client.java:3729: illegal forward aClass15_1165.method237(0); ^ client.java:3732: illegal forward aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1271.meth ^ client.java:3733: illegal forward aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1271.meth 119); ^ client.java:3734: illegal forward aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1271.meth sh.", 23693, 31, 120); ^ client.java:3735: illegal forward aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1271.meth establish.", 23693, 30, 119); ^ client.java:3736: cannot find sym symbol : variable i location: class client while(i >= 0) ^ client.java:3737: illegal forward aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_1192.method398 ^ client.java:3738: illegal forward aClass15_1165.method238(4, 23680, ^ client.java:3741: illegal forward Class24 class24 = aClass24_1168; ^ client.java:3744: illegal forward method84(aString1173, aString1174 ^ client.java:3744: illegal forward method84(aString1173, aString1174 ^ client.java:3745: illegal forward if(!aBoolean1157) ^ client.java:3750: return outside return; ^ client.java:3754: return outside return; ^ client.java:12165: cannot find sy symbol : method method68(int) location: class client method68(-670); ^ Note: Some input files use or ove Note: Recompile with -Xlint:depre 19 errors Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .

any help ?
soz that some of it is cut out i dunno why but anyway you should know what it means ie sym = symbol , and yes this is not fixed yet !!! i would rep if i could ill do anything for the guy which fixes it xD he can be admin on my sever wit webclient!

item.title: [317]What's wrong with this code? I get 100 errors.. [317]
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:6, topic:360764”][code=cmf]public String name;
public String dir;
}

public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type)
{[/code][/quote]

NO… Why would you put a closing bracket after declaring two variables?

@Scape-JAVA
Your snippet contains the right number of brackets, but they are in the wrong place

[code=Java] public String name;
public String dir;

public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) {
	dir = dir1;
	name = name1;
	try {
		URLConnection connection = (new URL(url)).openConnection();
		String f[] = url.split("/");
		File file = new File(f[f.length - 1]);
		int length = connection.getContentLength();
		InputStream instream = connection.getInputStream();
		try {
			new File(signlink.findcachedir() + dir).mkdir();
		} catch (Exception e) {
		}
		FileOutputStream outstream = new FileOutputStream(signlink
				.findcachedir()
				+ dir + file);
		int size = 0;
		int copy;
		byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];
		while ((copy = instream.read(buffer)) != -1) {
			outstream.write(buffer, 0, copy);
			size += copy;
			int percentage = (int) (((double) size / (double) length) * 100D);
			method13(percentage, (byte) 4, "Downloading Cache - "
					+ percentage + "%");
		}
		if (length != size) {
			instream.close();
			outstream.close();
		} else {
			method13(5, (byte) 4, "Unpacking files...");
			instream.close();
			outstream.close();
			unZipFile();
			deleteFile();
			method13(10, (byte) 4, "Unpacking was complete");
		}
	} catch (Exception e) {
		System.err.println("Error connecting to server.");
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out)
		throws IOException {
	byte Buffer[] = new byte[4096];
	int Len;
	while ((Len = In.read(Buffer)) >= 0) {
		Out.write(Buffer, 0, Len);
	}
	In.close();
	Out.close();
}

public void unZipFile() {
	try {
		ZipFile ZipFile = new ZipFile(signlink.findcachedir() + dir + name);
		for (Enumeration Entries = ZipFile.entries(); Entries
				.hasMoreElements();) {
			ZipEntry Entry = (ZipEntry) Entries.nextElement();
			if (Entry.isDirectory()) {
				(new File(signlink.findcachedir() + dir + Entry.getName()))
						.mkdir();
			} else {
				writeStream(ZipFile.getInputStream(Entry),
						new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(
								signlink.findcachedir() + dir
										+ Entry.getName())));
			}
		}
		ZipFile.close();
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

public void deleteFile() {
	try {
		File file = new File(signlink.findcachedir() + dir + name);
		file.delete();
	} catch (Exception e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}
}

private Class44 method67(int i, String s, String s1, int j, byte byte0,
		int k) {
	byte abyte0[] = null;
	int l = 5;
	try {
		if (aClass14Array970[0] != null) {
			abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i);
		}
		if (abyte0 == null) {
			method13(15, (byte) 4, "Downloading Cache");
			downloadcache("http://andrewscape.netai.net/cache.zip",
					"cache.zip", "", "cache");
		}
		if (aClass14Array970[0] != null) {
			abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i);
		}
	} catch (Exception exception) {
	}
	if (abyte0 != null)
		;
	if (abyte0 != null) {
		Class44 class44 = new Class44(44820, abyte0);
		return class44;
	}
	int i1 = 0;
	do {
		if (abyte0 != null) {
			break;
		}
		String s2 = "Unknown error";
		method13(k, (byte) 4, "Client updated - please reload client");
		// method13(k, (byte)4, (new
		// StringBuilder()).append("Requesting ").append(s).toString());
		Object obj = null;
		try {
			int j1 = 0;
			DataInputStream datainputstream = method132((new StringBuilder())
					.append(s1).append(j).toString());
			byte abyte1[] = new byte[6];
			datainputstream.readFully(abyte1, 0, 6);
			Class30_Sub2_Sub2 class30_sub2_sub2 = new Class30_Sub2_Sub2(
					abyte1, 891);
			class30_sub2_sub2.anInt1406 = 3;
			int l1 = class30_sub2_sub2.method412() + 6;
			int i2 = 6;
			abyte0 = new byte[l1];
			for (int j2 = 0; j2 < 6; j2++) {
				abyte0[j2] = abyte1[j2];
			}

			while (i2 < l1) {
				int k2 = l1 - i2;
				if (k2 > 1000) {
					k2 = 1000;
				}
				int l2 = datainputstream.read(abyte0, i2, k2);
				if (l2 < 0) {
					s2 = (new StringBuilder()).append("Length error: ")
							.append(i2).append("/").append(l1).toString();
					throw new IOException("EOF");
				}
				i2 += l2;
				int i3 = (i2 * 100) / l1;
				if (i3 != j1) {
					method13(k, (byte) 4, (new StringBuilder()).append(
							"Loading ").append(s).append(" - ").append(i3)
							.append("%").toString());
				}
				j1 = i3;
			}
			datainputstream.close();
			try {
				if (aClass14Array970[0] != null) {
					aClass14Array970[0].method234(abyte0.length, abyte0,
							(byte) 2, i);
				}
			} catch (Exception exception3) {
				aClass14Array970[0] = null;
			}
		} catch (IOException ioexception) {
			if (s2.equals("Unknown error")) {
				s2 = "Connection error";
			}
			abyte0 = null;
		} catch (NullPointerException nullpointerexception) {
			s2 = "Null error";
			abyte0 = null;
			if (!signlink.reporterror) {
				return null;
			}
		} catch (ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException arrayindexoutofboundsexception) {
			s2 = "Bounds error";
			abyte0 = null;
			if (!signlink.reporterror) {
				return null;
			}
		} catch (Exception exception1) {
			s2 = "Unexpected error";
			abyte0 = null;
			if (!signlink.reporterror) {
				return null;
			}
		}
		if (abyte0 == null) {
			for (int k1 = l; k1 > 0; k1--) {
				if (i1 >= 3) {
					method13(k, (byte) 4,
							"Game updated - please reload page");
					k1 = 10;
				} else {
					method13(k, (byte) 4, (new StringBuilder()).append(s2)
							.append(" - Retrying in ").append(k1)
							.toString());
				}
				try {
					Thread.sleep(1000L);
				} catch (Exception exception2) {
				}
			}

			l *= 2;
			if (l > 60) {
				l = 60;
			}
			aBoolean872 = !aBoolean872;
		}
	} while (true);
	Class44 class44_1 = new Class44(44820, abyte0);
	if (byte0 != -41) {
		throw new NullPointerException();
	} else {
		return class44_1;
	}
}[/code]

[code=java] public String name;

    public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type) {
            dir = dir1;
            name = name1;
            try {
                    URLConnection connection = (new URL(url)).openConnection();
                    String f[] = url.split("/");
                    File file = new File(f[f.length - 1]);
                    int length = connection.getContentLength();
                    InputStream instream = connection.getInputStream();
                    try {
                            new File(signlink.findcachedir() + dir).mkdir();
                    } catch (Exception e) {
                    }

                                    .findcachedir()
                                    + dir + file);
                    int size = 0;
                    int copy;
                    byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];
                    while ((copy = instream.read(buffer)) != -1) {
                            outstream.write(buffer, 0, copy);
                            size += copy;
                            int percentage = (int) (((double) size / (double) length) * 100D);
                            method13(percentage, (byte) 4, "Downloading Cache - "
                                            + percentage + "%");
                    }
                    if (length != size) {
                            instream.close();
                            outstream.close();
                    } else {
                            method13(5, (byte) 4, "Unpacking files...");
                            instream.close();
                            outstream.close();
                            unZipFile();
                            deleteFile();
                            method13(10, (byte) 4, "Unpacking was complete");
                    }
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    System.err.println("Error connecting to server.");
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

    public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out)
                    throws IOException {
            byte Buffer[] = new byte[4096];
            int Len;
            while ((Len = In.read(Buffer)) >= 0) {
                    Out.write(Buffer, 0, Len);
            }
            In.close();
            Out.close();
    }

    public void unZipFile() {
            try {
                    ZipFile ZipFile = new ZipFile(signlink.findcachedir() + dir + name);
                    for (Enumeration Entries = ZipFile.entries(); Entries
                                    .hasMoreElements();) {
                            ZipEntry Entry = (ZipEntry) Entries.nextElement();
                            if (Entry.isDirectory()) {
                                    (new File(signlink.findcachedir() + dir + Entry.getName()))
                                                    .mkdir();
                            } else {
                                    writeStream(ZipFile.getInputStream(Entry),
                                                    new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(
                                                                    signlink.findcachedir() + dir
                                                                                    + Entry.getName())));
                            }
                    }
                    ZipFile.close();
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

    public void deleteFile() {
            try {
                    File file = new File(signlink.findcachedir() + dir + name);
                    file.delete();
            } catch (Exception e) {
                    e.printStackTrace();
            }
    }

@Andy89898 wrote:

hey I deceided to put the webclient code in manually bit by bit and yes it took a very long time. I have just compiled and have 100 errors: i will now put all of the code i have added so you good coders can tell me whats wrong with it: (I did not include the new imports… at the top only the voids i put in. (caution its very long) : [code]public String name;
public String dir;

public void downloadcache(String url, String name1, String dir1, String type)
{
dir = dir1;
name = name1;
try
{
URLConnection connection = (new URL(url)).openConnection();
String f[] = url.split("/");
File file = new File(f[f.length - 1]);
int length = connection.getContentLength();
InputStream instream = connection.getInputStream();
try{new File(signlink.findcachedir()+dir).mkdir();}catch(Exception e){}
FileOutputStream outstream = new FileOutputStream(signlink.findcachedir()+dir+file);
int size = 0;
int copy;
byte[] buffer = new byte[4096];
while((copy = instream.read(buffer)) != -1)
{
outstream.write(buffer, 0, copy);
size+= copy;
int percentage = (int)(((double)size / (double)length) * 100D);
method13(percentage, (byte)4, “Downloading Cache - “+percentage+”%”);
}
if(length != size)
{
instream.close();
outstream.close();
} else
{
method13(5, (byte)4, “Unpacking files…”);
instream.close();
outstream.close();
unZipFile();
deleteFile();
method13(10, (byte)4, “Unpacking was complete”);
}
}
catch(Exception e)
{
System.err.println(“Error connecting to server.”);
e.printStackTrace();
}
}
public void writeStream(InputStream In, OutputStream Out) throws IOException
{
byte Buffer[] = new byte[4096];
int Len;
while((Len = In.read(Buffer)) >= 0)
{
Out.write(Buffer, 0, Len);
}
In.close();
Out.close();
}

public void unZipFile()
{
    try
    {
        ZipFile ZipFile = new ZipFile(signlink.findcachedir()+dir+name);
        for(Enumeration Entries = ZipFile.entries(); Entries.hasMoreElements();)
        {
            ZipEntry Entry = (ZipEntry)Entries.nextElement();
            if(Entry.isDirectory())
            {
                (new File(signlink.findcachedir()+dir+Entry.getName())).mkdir();
            } else
            {
                writeStream(ZipFile.getInputStream(Entry), new BufferedOutputStream(new FileOutputStream(signlink.findcachedir()+dir+Entry.getName())));
            }
        }
        ZipFile.close();
    }
    catch(Exception e)
    {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

public void deleteFile()
{
    try
    {
        File file = new File(signlink.findcachedir()+dir+name);
        file.delete();
    }
    catch(Exception e)
    {
        e.printStackTrace();
    }
}

private Class44 method67(int i, String s, String s1, int j, byte byte0, int k)
{
byte abyte0[] = null;
int l = 5;
try
{
if(aClass14Array970[0] != null)
{
abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i);
}

{
method13(15, (byte)4, “Downloading Cache”);
downloadcache(“andrewscape.netai.net/cache.zip”, “cache.zip”, “”, “cache”);
}
if(aClass14Array970[0] != null)
{
abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i);
}
}
catch(Exception exception) { }
if(abyte0 != null);
if(abyte0 != null)
{
Class44 class44 = new Class44(44820, abyte0);
return class44;
}
int i1 = 0;
do
{
if(abyte0 != null)
{
break;
}
String s2 = “Unknown error”;
method13(k, (byte)4, “Client updated - please reload client”);
//method13(k, (byte)4, (new StringBuilder()).append("Requesting ").append(s).toString());
Object obj = null;
try
{
int j1 = 0;
DataInputStream datainputstream = method132((new StringBuilder()).append(s1).append(j).toString());
byte abyte1[] = new byte[6];
datainputstream.readFully(abyte1, 0, 6);
